dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Hello, Amy. Glad we finally meet.

dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: Same here, John. I heard a lot about you.

dialogues.speaker: Amy
dialogues.text: Of course, only the most impressive feats.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: A friendly banter ended, setting a tone for the rest of the evening...
